outlets.name: Skansagarður Buffet
outlets.description: Our all-inclusive buffet with freshly prepared dishes from quality ingredients, including gluten-free and vegetarian options.

outlets.name: Munkastova
outlets.description: An award-winning á la carte restaurant offering a fine selection of Nordic cuisine in a relaxed, intimate atmosphere.

outlets.name: Nóatún Cafeteria
outlets.description: A place for all ages to gather and enjoy a good cup of coffee, a light bite, or a delicious pizza.

outlets.name: Laterna Magica
outlets.description: Thirty metres above the sea, offering spectacular Atlantic views, a wide selection of drinks, and light meals.

outlets.name: Sjóbúðin Tax-Free
outlets.description: Great deals on perfume, cosmetics, sweets, and spirits. Find the perfect gift or treat for yourself.

outlets.name: Reception
outlets.description: We are here to assist with cabin keys, information, currency exchange, and any questions you may have.

entertainment.name: Undirhúsið Pub
entertainment.description: Relax with a good book or enjoy cakes, beer, and wine. In the evenings, we have bingo and live Faroese music.

entertainment.name: Pool, Fitness & Sauna
entertainment.description: Stay active in our fitness room, take a refreshing dip in the swimming pool, or unwind in the sauna.

entertainment.name: Outdoor Hot Tubs
entertainment.description: Relax in one of our three large outdoor hot tubs and enjoy the fresh sea air and stunning ocean views.

entertainment.name: Movie Screening
entertainment.description: Catch a blockbuster movie in our comfortable cinema, located next to the reception.
